trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around March 11th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn March 11th 2011, I was taking my 11 year old girlfriends daughter to school. At about 9:15 am while traveling on Joy Lake road she said she saw a Flying Saucer out her window up above the tree line. She said she saw two objects one round red one and one oval gray one. Both with a Saturn like ring around them. She said the rings were the same color but darker. The ring on the red one was horizontal and the gray one vertical. She said they Bounced off each other 3 times then suddenly stopped then vanished. I would like to know if anyone else saw this. It was the day of the tsunami in Japan.
Summary: 11 year old see two ufos, one red and one grey with rings around them, crashing into each other.
